[@Hendrik Peter](@Bp5Z5TQKv6E/Y+QZn/3LiDWMPi63EP8MHsXZ4tiIb2w=.ed25519) 

Have you seen %g3hPVPDEO1Aj/uPl0+J2NlhFB2bbFLIHlty+YuqFZ3w=.sha256 and %FMtGQnt3QdX14KLl+ol4hn/LqzfXFLJZxKjCR1mMm0E=.sha256? We've reached some rough consensus on the `ssb:` URI scheme and the code has been written, but it hasn't been integrated into all of the applications (yet).
